definition: the public sale of something to the highest bidder, to sell something to the highest bidder
details:
noun
- the public sale of something to the highest bidder
= synonyms: auction sale, vendue
- a variety of bridge in which tricks made in excess of the contract are scored toward game
= synonyms: auction bridge
verb
- to sell something to the highest bidder
= example: to sell something to the highest bidder
= synonyms: auctioneer, auction off
